title: Anastasiia Prudinskaya
description: I am a cheerful and skilled frontend developer. I use React, Next.js, TypeScript, RTK Query, SWR, HTML, CSS, SASS,  Git, GitHub, Docker. Life motto - everything is possible!
me: Anastasiia Prudinskaya is a frontend developer
greeting: My name is Anastasiia Prudinskaya and I am pleased to welcome you to my website! 👋
welcomeContent: Three cards will tell you about me, what I do and how to contact me.
welcomeContent2: And if you want all the information in one file — click on
pointAbout: To find out who I am — click on
pointWorks: To see my works — click on
pointContacts: If you have any suggestions or questions — click on
worksContent1: I am a cheerful and skilled frontend developer.
worksContent2: Why 'frontend'? I like to see the result of my actions and how beautiful, animated and functional websites appear on a blank browser page.
worksContent3: I use React, Next.js, TypeScript, RTK Query, SWR, HTML, CSS, SASS/SCSS, Git, GitHub, Docker.
worksContent4: You will find my work below. Something I deploy (Docker, Nginx, GitHub Pages, Caprover) and something remains a line of code in GitHub.
worksContent5: My most important project is LKS - Little Knits Story, which started in May 2022, my journey from theory and courses to the real challenges of today.
worksListLKS: This project has given me a lot:
worksItem1: taught to apply the knowledge gained in the courses on real tasks, as well as to learn new things in the moment
worksItem2: taught how to work in a team, communicate with a product manager, backend developers and designers, work in Jira, GitHub Projects, Trello, Slack. And phone calls, of course 😁
worksItem3: taught how to make urgent edits 😅
worksItem4: taught me how to fix a production that I myself had dropped 😅
worksItem5: taught how to resolve conflicts...in git, of course 😁
worksListTools: We rewrote the project several times from scratch, which gave us the opportunity to try different tools:
worksItem6: from JavaScript to TypeScript, from React to Next.js, from RTK Query to SWR
worksItem8: adaptive layout, Figma and Bootstrap remain the same, although I do use Tailwind on other projects, my website is written on it, for example 😉
worksContent6: There are many more projects ahead, perhaps we will create them together with you 😉
softSkills1: I love balance sheet ⚖️, perhaps my education as an accountant influenced this. 😁
softSkills2: In work and hobbies I am diligent and determined, until I see results 🏆 I will not rest, I will do and do ⛏⛏.
softSkills3: I enjoy working both as part of a team 👨‍💻👨‍💻 and on my own 👩‍💻.
softSkills4: Over the years of working in various positions, she has learned to adapt, take responsibility and make decisions.
hobbyContent1: Active recreation? Creative crafts? Travelling? A walk with the dog?
hobbyContent2: Or stay home, order a pizza and watch a film/series?
hobbyContent3: To all questions, I will answer
hobby1: I go hiking 🏕, cycle 🚲, swim in the pool 🤿.
hobby2: I enjoy cross stitching 🪡 painting by number 🎨, beading jewellery 💍.
hobby3: Would love to fly ✈️ to a new country, take a road trip 🚙 or go for a walk with my lovely dog 🐕.
hobby4: But I also like to stay home 🏠 to watch 📺 a film/series, play computer games 🎮 or just do nothing 🛋.
